comments.id: Unique identifier of the test case.
comments.title: Title of the test case, briefly describing the test content.
comments.objective: Purpose of the test, explaining the function or feature that the test case aims to verify.
comments.test_reference: Reference documents for the test case, such as RFC section numbers, etc.
topology: Device and port connection information involved in the test case, including the following fields:
1. name: Name of the device, used to uniquely identify the device, such as tester, DUT1, DeviceA, etc.
2. type: Type of the device (e.g., tester, DUT, etc.).
3. ports: List of ports of the device, describing each port of the device.
- name: Name of the port, used to uniquely identify the port, such as port1, etc.
- connected_to: Describes the device and port to which this port is connected, in the format 'device name:port name'.
comments.steps:
Detailed description of the test steps, each step includes:
step_id: Unique identifier of the step.
description: Specific operations or configurations of the step.
expected_result: Expected result of this step.
comments.tags: Tags of the test case, used for classifying or filtering test cases, types include: ['function', 'performance']
comments.appendix: Appendix section, containing additional information or instructions, such as configuration parameters of the test environment, precautions, etc.
